project_abstract.cdata: The project provides for the purchase and installation in the Kabul area of a gas turbine power station of the package type, with two units of about 20 MW each, to improve the power balance and to meet the growing demand of the Kabul electric system. Personnel training for operation and maintenance of the power station facilities would also be provided.
